question: What are the names of the teams that participated in the World Cup tournament held in 2018?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[participation:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year = 2018
RETURN team, participation, tournament, team.name

question: Can you provide the date and stage of each game in the 2022 World Cup where the score exceeded 3-3?
cypher:
MATCH (world_cup:Tournament)-[match_tournament_relation:IN_TOURNAMENT]-(football_match:Match)<-[team_played_relation:PLAYED_IN]-(team:Team)
WHERE world_cup.year = 2022 AND team_played_relation.score > 3
RETURN world_cup, football_match, match_tournament_relation, team_played_relation, team, football_match.date, football_match.stage

question: What are the names of all persons who were coaches for any squad in the 2006 World Cup?
cypher:
MATCH (coach:Person)-[relation3:COACH_FOR]->(squad:Squad)-[relation4:FOR]->(tournament:Tournament {year: 2006})
RETURN relation4, relation3, tournament, squad, coach, coach.name

question: List the names of tournaments in which a team netted over 5 goals in a single match throughout the 1998 World Cup.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[played_rel:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament_rel:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year = 1998 AND played_rel.score > 5
RETURN in_tournament_rel, played_rel, match, team, tournament, tournament.name

question: Identify the players who played for more than 90 minutes in the matches of the 2010 World Cup quarter-finals.
cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[play_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year = 2010 AND match.stage = "Quarter-finals" AND toInteger(play_in.minuteOn) > 90
RETURN player, play_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, player.name

question: How many different teams have appeared in all the finals of the World Cup tournaments between 1998 and 2018?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[relation4:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament)<-[relation5:IN_TOURNAMENT]-(match:Match)
WHERE tournament.year >= 1998 AND tournament.year <= 2018 AND match.stage = "Final"
WITH team, COUNT(DISTINCT tournament) AS finalsCount
MATCH (totalTournament:Tournament)
WHERE totalTournament.year >= 1998 AND totalTournament.year <= 2018
WITH team, finalsCount, COUNT(totalTournament) AS totalFinals
WHERE finalsCount = totalFinals
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT team)

question: What is the total number of players who participated in both the 2002 and 2006 World Cups?
cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[relation3:IN_SQUAD]->(squad:Squad)-[relation4:FOR]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year=2002 OR tournament.year=2006
WITH player, COLLECT(tournament.year) AS years
WHERE ALL(y IN [2002, 2006] WHERE y IN years)
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT player)

question: Could you determine the youngest age among those who netted a goal during the 2018 World Cup?
cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scoredGoal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year = 2018
RETURN MIN(date().year - player.dob.year) AS MinAgeOfScoringPlayer

question: What was the highest score attained by any team in the 2002 World Cup matches?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[playedIn:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year = 2002
RETURN MAX(playedIn.score)

question: How many matches ended in a penalty shootout in the World Cup from 1990 to 2010?
cypher:
MATCH (match:Match)-[relation2:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year >= 1990 AND tournament.year <= 2010 AND match.stage = "Penalty Shootout"
RETURN COUNT(match) AS NumberOfPenaltyShootouts

question: Identify the years and names of all tournaments in which players born after 1985, who played in the England team and scored during penalty shootouts, have participated.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"England"})<-[represents:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person)-[played:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)
MATCH (player)-[in_squad:IN_SQUAD]->(squad:Squad)
MATCH (squad)-[for_tourn:FOR]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE player.dob > date("1985-12-31") AND played.type = "penalty" AND played.score > 0
RETURN team, represents, player, played, match, in_squad, squad, for_tourn, tournament, tournament.year, tournament.name

question: List the match IDs and the respective stages of matches where players over 35 years old scored from the Spain team during the EURO 2020 campaign.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Spain"})<-[represent:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person)
MATCH (player)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)
MATCH (match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {name:"EURO 2020"})
WHERE player.dob <= date("1985-01-01")
RETURN team, represent, player, scored, match, in_tournament, tournament, match.id, match.stage

question: During which minutes did Italy team members score in the group stage match against Brazil and in the quarter-final versus Germany during the Italy 1990 World Cup?
cypher:
MATCH (italy_team:Team {name:"Italy"})<-[represent_italy_players:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person), 
      (player)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match), 
      (match)-[match_in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(world_cup:Tournament {name:"Italy 1990"})
MATCH (opponent_team:Team)-[opponent_played:PLAYED_IN]->(match)
WHERE (opponent_team.name="Brazil" AND match.stage="group match") OR (opponent_team.name="Germany" AND match.stage="quarter-final")
RETURN italy_team, represent_italy_players, player, scored_goal, match, match_in_tournament, world_cup, opponent_team, opponent_played, scored_goal.minute

question: Detail the minute and type of playing (starter or substitute) for goals scored by France team members in matches that went to extra time during the South Africa 2010 World Cup.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"France"})-[represent:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person)
MATCH (player)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)
MATCH (match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {name:"South Africa 2010"})
MATCH (player)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match)
WHERE match.stage = "extra time"
RETURN team, represent, player, scored, match, in_tournament, tournament, played_in, scored.minute, played_in.type

question: During which minutes did defenders from the Netherlands score goals in Euro 2008 matches that were won by more than two goals?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Netherlands"})<-[represents:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)
MATCH (match)-[played:PLAYED_IN {type:"defender"}]-(team)
MATCH (match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {name:"Euro 2008"})
WHERE abs(played.score - played.penaltyScore) > 2
RETURN team, represents, player, scored, match, played, in_tournament, tournament, scored.minute

question: Provide information on the timing and scoring of goals that facilitated a teams comeback in the second half of the knockout rounds of Euro 2012.
cypher:
MATCH (match:Match)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]-(team:Team)
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match)
MATCH (team)-[participated_in:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {name: "Euro 2012"})
WHERE match.stage CONTAINS "knockout" AND toInteger(scored_goal.minute) >= 45 AND (played_in.score <> 0 OR played_in.penaltyScore <> 0)
RETURN match, played_in, team, player, scored_goal, participated_in, tournament, scored_goal.minute, played_in.score, played_in.penaltyScore

question: What are the penalty score situations and players involved for matches in the Germany 2006 World Cup that had winning goals scored in the final 5 minutes of regular time?
cypher:
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "Germany 2006"})
MATCH (match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match)
MATCH (player)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match)
MATCH (team:Team)<-[represents:REPRESENTS]-(player)
WHERE scored.minute >= "85"
RETURN match, in_tournament, tournament, player, scored, played_in, team, represents, played_in.score, played_in.penaltyScore

question: How many players, who have scored more than three goals in World Cup 2018, were aged 30 or older at the time of the tournament?
cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[in:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.name="World Cup 2018" AND tournament.year=2018
WITH player, COUNT(scored) AS goals
WHERE goals > 3
MATCH (player)-[relation6:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team)
WITH player, goals, duration.between(player.dob, date({year: 2018, month: 6, day: 14})).years AS ageAtTournament
WHERE ageAtTournament >= 30
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT player)

question: Calculate the minimum and maximum penalty scores achieved by teams in semi-final matches, from World Cups held between 2002 and 2014.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[playedIn:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year >= 2002 AND tournament.year <= 2014 AND match.stage = "Semi-final"
RETURN MIN(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS MinPenaltyScore, MAX(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS MaxPenaltyScore

question: Determine how often teams that were behind at halftime managed to win the game in Euro 2004.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[firstHalf:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.name = 'Euro 2004' AND firstHalf.type = 'First Half' AND firstHalf.score < 0
WITH match, team
MATCH (team)-[secondHalf:PLAYED_IN]->(match)
WHERE secondHalf.type = 'Second Half' AND secondHalf.score > 0
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT match)

question: What is the total of scores from games that extended into extra time in the France 1998 FIFA World Cup?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[playedIn:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.name="France 1998" AND match.stage="Extra Time"
RETURN SUM(playedIn.score)

question: Can you list all the players who were included in the Brazilian team for the 2014 World Cup?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Brazil"})-[relation4:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2014}),
      (player:Person)-[relation5:IN_SQUAD]->(squad:Squad)-[relation6:FOR]->(tournament),
      (team)-[relation7:NAMED]->(squad)
RETURN relation7, relation6, relation5, relation4, player, team, squad, tournament, player.name

question: What is the date of birth of each player who scored in the final of the 2018 World Cup?
cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match), 
      (match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year=2018 AND match.stage="final"
RETURN player, scored, match, in_tournament, tournament, player.dob

question: Which teams played in the semi-finals of the 2002 World Cup?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year=2002 AND match.stage="semi-finals"
RETURN team, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, team.name

question: What are the match stages and dates for matches where Germany scored more than 3 goals?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Germany"})-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]-(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE played_in.score > 3
RETURN team, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, match.stage, match.date

question: List all tournaments where Lionel Messi has participated.
cypher:
MATCH (player:Person {name:"Lionel Messi"})-[relation3:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team)-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament)
RETURN relation3, player, team, participated, tournament, tournament.name, tournament.shortName, tournament.year

question: Which players from the England team participated in both the 2010 and 2014 World Cups?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"England"})-[relation6:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person)-[relation7:PLAYED_IN]-(match2010:Match)-[relation8:IN_TOURNAMENT]-(tournament2010:Tournament {year: 2010}),
      (player)-[relation9:PLAYED_IN]-(match2014:Match)-[relation10:IN_TOURNAMENT]-(tournament2014:Tournament {year: 2014})
RETURN relation10, relation9, relation8, relation7, relation6, player, team, match2010, match2014, tournament2010, tournament2014, player.name

question: Which coaches were named for squads that played in at least two consecutive World Cups?
cypher:
MATCH (coach:Person)-[relation4:COACH_FOR]->(squad:Squad)-[relation5:FOR]->(tournament1:Tournament),
      (squad)-[relation6:FOR]->(tournament2:Tournament)
WHERE tournament1.year = tournament2.year - 4
RETURN relation6, relation5, relation4, coach, squad, tournament1, tournament2, coach.name

question: How many matches involving France were played in the Group Stage of the 2014 World Cup?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"France"})-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE match.stage="Group Stage" AND tournament.year=2014
RETURN team, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, count(match)

question: In 2012, when Spain competed against Italy, was it a knockout or group stage match?
cypher:
MATCH (teamSpain:Team {name:"Spain"})-[playedInSpain:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)<-[playedInItaly:PLAYED_IN]-(teamItaly:Team {name:"Italy"}),
      (match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2012})
RETURN teamSpain, playedInSpain, match, playedInItaly, teamItaly, inTournament, tournament, match.stage

question: What were the ratings given to Neymar in each of his World Cup games?
cypher:
MATCH (player:Person {name:"Neymar"})-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)
RETURN player, played_in, match, played_in.score

question: In how many distinct tournaments has Cristiano Ronaldo made a goal?
cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE player.name="Cristiano Ronaldo"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT tournament)

question: What is the mean count of goals per game for Germany in World Cup competitions?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[relation4:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament),
      (player:Person)-[relation5:REPRESENTS]->(team),
      (player)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[relation7:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE team.name="Germany" AND tournament.name CONTAINS "World Cup"
RETURN AVG(scored.minute) AS averageGoalsPerMatch

question: Whats the highest goal count by an individual player during the quarter-finals in all World Cup tournaments?
cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)
WHERE match.stage="quarter-final"
RETURN player.name, COUNT(scored) AS goals
ORDER BY goals DESC
LIMIT 1

question: Count the number of assists made by players from Argentina in the 2018 tournament.
cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[represents:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team)
WHERE team.name="Argentina"
MATCH (player)-[relation5:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[relation6:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year=2018
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT match)

question: How many players participated in both the 2010 and 2014 World Cups?
cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[relation5:PLAYED_IN]->(node1:Match)-[relation8:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament2010:Tournament)
WHERE tournament2010.year = 2010
WITH player
MATCH (player)-[relation6:PLAYED_IN]->(node3:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament2014:Tournament)
WHERE tournament2014.year = 2014
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT player)

question: How many teams have won the World Cup more than once?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.shortName CONTAINS "World Cup"
WITH team, COUNT(DISTINCT tournament) AS wins
WHERE wins > 1
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT team)

question: What are the names and dates of birth of the players who represent the team Germany and played in the 2022 tournament?
cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[represents:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team {name:"Germany"})
MATCH (player)-[relation5:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[relation6:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2022})
RETURN relation6, relation5, player, represents, team, match, tournament, player.name, player.dob

question: Can you identify the stages and dates of the matches where the squad named Italy 2024 played during the 2024 tournament?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[named:NAMED]->(squad:Squad {id:"Italy 2024"})-[relation5:FOR]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2024})
MATCH (team)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
RETURN relation5, team, named, squad, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, match.stage, match.date

question: Kindly list every tournament involving the Spain National Team by year and name, including the specifics of each participating squad.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Spain National Team"})-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament), (team)-[named:NAMED]->(squad:Squad)-[in_for:FOR]->(tournament)
RETURN team, participated, tournament, named, squad, in_for, tournament.year, tournament.name

question: List all the team names and match dates for the matches that occurred in the Brazil 2014 part of the tournament.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {name:"Brazil 2014"})
RETURN team, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, team.name, match.date

question: Could you list the names of the coaches who have coached a squad participating in any World Cup tournament held between 1990 and 2022?
cypher:
MATCH (coach:Person)-[coach_for:COACH_FOR]->(squad:Squad)-[for_tournament:FOR]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year >= 1990 AND tournament.year <= 2022
RETURN coach, coach_for, squad, for_tournament, tournament, coach.name

question: Which minutes did players from the squad England 2022 score goals during matches in the semi-final stage of the 2022 World Cup?
cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[relation5:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
MATCH (player)-[relation6:IN_SQUAD]->(squad:Squad)-[relation7:FOR]->(tournament)
WHERE squad.id="England 2022" AND tournament.shortName="2022 World Cup" AND match.stage="semi-final"
RETURN relation7, relation6, relation5, player, scored_goal, match, tournament, squad, scored_goal.minute

question: Could you inform me about the number of goals and the specific times they were scored by the France team during the group stages of the 1998 World Cup?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"France"})-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {shortName:"1998 World Cup"}),
      (person:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament),
      (person)-[represents:REPRESENTS]->(team)
WHERE match.stage="group"
RETURN team, participated, tournament, person, scored, match, in_tournament, represents, scored.minute

question: What were the results and methods of scoring (goal, penalty) in the games featuring the Brazil team in the knockout stage of the 2002 tournament?
cypher:
MATCH (brazilTeam:Team {name:"Brazil"})-[relation3:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2002}),
      (brazilTeam)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[relation5:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament),
      (match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE match.stage CONTAINS "knockout"
RETURN relation5, relation3, brazilTeam, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, played_in.score, played_in.type

question: Please provide the minutes of goals scored and the type of tournament matches played by any squad that the Netherlands team named at Euro 2024.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Netherlands"})-[relation5:NAMED]->(squad:Squad)-[relation6:IN_SQUAD]-(player:Person)
MATCH (player)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[relation8:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {name:"Euro 2024"})
RETURN relation8, relation6, relation5, team, squad, player, scored_goal, match, tournament, scored_goal.minute, match.stage

question: Identify the minute values and match stages for the goals scored by the Argentina squad during the Group and Final stages of the 2018 tournament.
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Argentina"})-[relation5:NAMED]->(squad:Squad)
MATCH (player:Person)-[relation6:REPRESENTS]->(team)
MATCH (player)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[relation8:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2018})
WHERE match.stage IN ["Group", "Final"]
RETURN relation8, relation6, relation5, team, squad, player, scored_goal, match, tournament, scored_goal.minute, match.stage

question: What is the average, minimum, and maximum score by teams in all matches of the 2018 Russia World Cup?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[played:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.name="2018 Russia"
RETURN AVG(played.score) AS AverageScore, MIN(played.score) AS MinimumScore, MAX(played.score) AS MaximumScore

question: Could you calculate the total number of goals scored, the highest individual score, and the average score per match for the USA team in Stanford 1994 matches?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament), 
      (team)-[playedInTeam:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE team.name="USA" AND tournament.name="Stanford 1994"
WITH match, playedInTeam.score AS teamScore

// Calculate total goals
WITH SUM(teamScore) AS totalGoals, AVG(teamScore) AS avgScorePerMatch, MAX(teamScore) AS highestIndividualScore
RETURN totalGoals, highestIndividualScore, avgScorePerMatch

question: Can you determine the average number of players per squad and the total number of coaches in all squads participating in FIFA 2010?
cypher:
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "FIFA 2010"})<-[relation6:FOR]-(squad:Squad)
WITH squad
MATCH (squad)<-[relation7:IN_SQUAD]-(player:Person)
WITH squad, COUNT(player) AS playersPerSquad
WITH AVG(playersPerSquad) AS averagePlayersPerSquad
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "FIFA 2010"})<-[relation8:FOR]-(squad:Squad)<-[relation9:COACH_FOR]-(coach:Person)
RETURN averagePlayersPerSquad, COUNT(DISTINCT coach) AS totalCoaches

question: What has been the total, average, and highest number of penalty scores recorded by teams in the quarter-finals matches of the Euro 2000?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[playedIn:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.name="Euro 2000" AND match.stage="quarter-finals"
RETURN SUM(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS totalPenaltyScores, AVG(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS averagePenaltyScores, MAX(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS highestPenaltyScore

question: I would like to know the lowest, highest, and average number of players from squads who have played in the Final stage of the World Cup 2006.
cypher:
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "World Cup 2006"})
MATCH (match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE match.stage = "Final"
MATCH (squad:Squad)-[forSquad:FOR]->(tournament)
MATCH (player:Person)-[playedIn:PLAYED_IN]->(match)-[inTournament]->(tournament)
WITH squad, COUNT(DISTINCT player) AS playerCount
RETURN MIN(playerCount) AS LowestPlayerCount, MAX(playerCount) AS HighestPlayerCount, AVG(playerCount) AS AveragePlayerCount

question: Can you supply the total, mean, and maximum penalty points scored by the Italy team during the 1994 USA tournament matches?
cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[playedIn:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE team.name="Italy" AND tournament.name="1994 USA"
RETURN SUM(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS TotalPenaltyScore, AVG(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS AveragePenaltyScore, MAX(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS HighestPenaltyScore
